nodes.text: During the Cold War, a squadron of T-85 X-wing starfighters served in the Starfighter Corps of the New Republic under the command of Kazuda Xiono. When New Republic Command acquired critical information pertaining to the First Order's operations in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories, New Republic Command tasked the squadron with delivering the intelligence to the Resistance. They were engaged by Major Elrik Vonreg of the First Order, until Xiono ordered his wingmates, Mia Gabon and Hugh Sion, to escape while he remained behind to complete the mission. With the arrival of Commander Poe Dameron, Xiono was able to drive off Vonreg's TIE.
